subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Relying on her chipping and near-perfect putting to overcome several errant tee shots, Cristie Kerr shot a six-under 66 on Friday to take a five-stroke lead at at the L.P.G.A.  Championship.
snippet: Relying on her chipping and near-perfect putting to overcome several errant tee shots, Cristie Kerr shot a six-under 66 on Friday to take a five-stroke lead at at the L.P.G.A.  Championship.
